score

Interface Score

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FastLLScore, FastMDLScore, LLScore, MDLScore

    public interface Score

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getScore(BayessianNetwork<? extends RandomVariable> bayessian, Dataset dataset)
      Computes the score of the given bayessian network based on the given dataset.

    • Method Detail

      • getScore

        double getScore(BayessianNetwork<? extends RandomVariable> bayessian,
              Dataset dataset)
        Computes the score of the given bayessian network based on the given dataset. The score function depends on the implementation.
        Parameters:
        bayessian - bayessian network to compute the score
        dataset - dataset used to compute the score
        Returns:
        value of the score of teh bayessian network
